org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors

Class ImmutableVec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.Vec
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.ImmutableVec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    Use vectorz instead.

    @Deprecated
 @Immutable
public final class ImmutableVec
extends Vec
    Immutable Vec. This vector cannot be modified (by anyone) and is thread-safe. You can create one using create(double[]) or immutable().
    Since:
    1.3
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
